name: Loop Troop
description:
A fun and intuitive action puzzle game - Draw a path for the Loop Troopers to follow!

Loop Troop features:

  • Unique path-drawing mechanic
  • Procedurally generated courses
  • A variety of fiendish traps to avoid
  • 5 difficulty levels
  • Mouse & stylus supported
  • Adorable Loop Troopers!
  • It's free!
